title: What is the specific date that URF will be hitting OCE?
body:
I know people have asked this question a million times, but im twitching to know the answer that we all want to know. WHEN IS URF OUT?!



#hailurf

replies.body:
I had read somewhere that U.R.F. is being enabled eventually, but it is not going to be up for April Fools. To make up for it, RIOT are going to release U.R.F. twice this year. 

I am not sure how accurate this information might be, and I do not know any dates on releases of U.R.F.

> We’re announcing it now is because two years in a row, we delivered the Ultra Rapid Fire game mode in increasingly absurd ways. While we’re pretty sure you aren’t going to believe us anyway, we’re telling you right now that URF will not return on the first of April.

If you want to know more: [Click Here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue)

But sadly, previously game modes would last 2 weeks or so (and then riot complains about sustaining game mode and cans it), but now we will have it TWICE, for 3/4 days. So totalling about a week and a bit.
So not really having twice, just once stretched out
